text: Pedals is the second album by Austin-based synth pop band Speak. The album was released on June 23, 2014 on Wind-up Records. Unlike the previous album, this was self-produced by member Troupe Gammage. ==Track listing== ==References== ==External links== *Pedals on iTunes Category:2014 albums Category:Speak (band) albums Category:Wind-up Records albums
title: Pedals (Speak album)
